scripts.test: npm update && npm run lint && npm run custom-tests && echo 'Done.'
scripts.build-doc: npm install -g wiki2pdf && cd design && wiki2pdf . -t Automotive_Data_Center --format all --footer footer.html
scripts.build: echo ${CAADE_REGISTRY} && echo $CAADE_REGISTRY && npm update && node ./deploy/build build
scripts.lint: node ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint . --max-warnings=0 && echo 'âœ”  Your code looks good.'
scripts.deploy-test: cd deploy && docker stack deploy --compose-file docker-compose-test.yaml dataLakeTest
